graph.node.operation

Class Operations

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.node.operation.Operations

  • public class Operations
extends java.lang.Object
    Operations applies an operation to given tensor inputs, without adding the tensors to the computational graph.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Operations() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Tensor addition(Tensor... inputs)
      Element-wise adds the given tensors.
      static Tensor[] broadcastInputs(Tensor... inputs)
      Checks if the inputted tensors require broadcasting, then broadcasts if necessary.
      static Tensor division(Tensor numerator, Tensor... denominators)
      Element-wise divides a given tensor by an array of tensors.
      static Tensor multiplication(Tensor... inputs)
      Element-wise multiplies the given tensors.
      static Tensor subtraction(Tensor minuend, Tensor... subtrahend)
      Element-wise subtracts an array of tensors from a given tensor.
      static Tensor sum(Tensor input, int... axes)
      Computes a sum of a tensor along a specific axis.

        public static Tensor division(Tensor numerator,
                              Tensor... denominators)
        Element-wise divides a given tensor by an array of tensors.
        Parameters:

        denominators - the tensors which will divide the given tensor
        Returns:

      • sum

        public static Tensor sum(Tensor input,
                         int... axes)
        Computes a sum of a tensor along a specific axis.
        Parameters:
        input - the tensor to sum
        axes - the axis to sum along
        Returns:
        the tensor summed along the axis
